name: Cannellini and Lentil Jamaican Curry
description: Cannellini and Lentil Jamaican Curry. 1 Pot 30 Minutes. Easy Coconut Curry with Jamaican Curry spices and beans and red lentils. Vegan Gluten-free Soy-free Nut-free Recipe.

video.name: Lentil & Bean Jamaican Curry - 1 Pot 30 Mins | VeganRicha.com
video.description:
Cannellini Bean and Lentil Jamaican Curry. 1 Pot 30 Minutes. 
RECIPE: http://www.veganricha.com/2017/11/cannellini-and-lentil-jamaican-curry-1-pot.html

Easy Coconut Curry with Jamaican Curry spices and beans and red lentils. Vegan Gluten-free Soy-free Nut-free Recipe. Add veggies like carrots, potatoes, squash with the lentils for a hearty stew. Instant Pot Option. 16+ Grams of Protein!

recipeIngredient: 1/2  hot green chile like serrano or scotch bonnet pepper (, chopped)
2 tsp Jamaican Curry powder (more or less to preference, see note)
1/2 cup red lentils ((dried) - the quick cooking kind - masoor dal)
15 oz can cannelini beans or chickpeas or kidney beans ((13 to 15 oz or 1.25 cups cooked beans))

recipeInstructions.text: Heat oil in a skillet over medium heat. Add the onion, garlic, chile. Cook until golden.
recipeInstructions.name: Heat oil in a skillet over medium heat. Add the onion, garlic, chile. Cook until golden.

recipeInstructions.text: Add the spices and cook for few seconds.
recipeInstructions.name: Add the spices and cook for few seconds.

recipeInstructions.text: Add the lentils, coconut milk, water and salt. Bring to a boil. Add the beans, and continue to cook for 10 to 12 minutes or until the lentils are cooked through. Add more water if needed.
recipeInstructions.name: Add the lentils, coconut milk, water and salt. Bring to a boil. Add the beans, and continue to cook for 10 to 12 minutes or until the lentils are cooked through. Add more water if needed.

recipeInstructions.text: Taste adjust salt and spices. Add a dash of sugar or maple for sweetening, more salt if needed, and more Jamaican curry powder. Add in the greens.. Simmer for 2-3 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Taste adjust salt and spices. Add a dash of sugar or maple for sweetening, more salt if needed, and more Jamaican curry powder. Add in the greens.. Simmer for 2-3 minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: Add a dash of cayenne and lemon juice. Serve hot over rice, with toasty bread or add more water for a soup.
recipeInstructions.name: Add a dash of cayenne and lemon juice. Serve hot over rice, with toasty bread or add more water for a soup.

keywords: jamaican lentil curry, jamaican vegan curry, jamaican vegetable curry
